    • 方法详细资料

      • onTransform

        protected abstract void onTransform(android.view.View page,
                                    float position)
        Called each transformPage(View, float).
        参数:
        page - Apply the transformation to this page
        position - Position of page relative to the current front-and-center position of the pager. 0 is front and center. 1 is one full page position to the right, and -1 is one page position to the left.

      • transformPage

        public void transformPage(android.view.View page,
                          float position)
        Apply a property transformation to the given page. For most use cases, this method should not be overridden. Instead use transformPage(View, float) to perform typical transformations.
        指定者:
        transformPage 在接口中 android.support.v4.view.ViewPager.PageTransformer
        参数:
        page - Apply the transformation to this page
        position - Position of page relative to the current front-and-center position of the pager. 0 is front and center. 1 is one full page position to the right, and -1 is one page position to the left.

      • hideOffscreenPages

        protected boolean hideOffscreenPages()
        If the position offset of a fragment is less than negative one or greater than one, returning true will set the fragment alpha to 0f. Otherwise fragment alpha is always defaulted to 1f.
        返回:

      • isPagingEnabled

        protected boolean isPagingEnabled()
        Indicates if the default animations of the view pager should be used.
        返回:

      • onPreTransform

        protected void onPreTransform(android.view.View page,
                              float position)
        Called each transformPage(View, float) before {onTransform(View, float).

        The default implementation attempts to reset all view properties. This is useful when toggling transforms that do not modify the same page properties. For instance changing from a transformation that applies rotation to a transformation that fades can inadvertently leave a fragment stuck with a rotation or with some degree of applied alpha.

        参数:
        page - Apply the transformation to this page
        position - Position of page relative to the current front-and-center position of the pager. 0 is front and center. 1 is one full page position to the right, and -1 is one page position to the left.

      • onPostTransform

        protected void onPostTransform(android.view.View page,
                               float position)
        Called each transformPage(View, float) after onTransform(View, float).
        参数:
        page - Apply the transformation to this page
        position - Position of page relative to the current front-and-center position of the pager. 0 is front and center. 1 is one full page position to the right, and -1 is one page position to the left.

      • min

        protected static final float min(float val,
                                 float min)
        Same as Math.min(double, double) without double casting, zero closest to infinity handling, or NaN support.
        参数:
        val -
        min -
        返回:
